name: Tanika Tech
description:
Jwero Chats a brand of Jwero.ai is a JewelTech Platform with end-to-end automation for businesses. One Dashboard to manage, automate and grow your business at ease with Omnichannel Commerce, Conversational Commerce, E-Commerce, Marketplace Commerce, In-Store Commerce, Social Commerce and Personal Commerce

Jwero Chats a Conversational Commerce enabling complete communication with customers and within Team from a single app or platform. No more juggling between multiple tools

Real-time Communication = Instant Decision Making = Faster Conversions
focus_areas: Omnichannel Communication (Whatsapp API, Facebook Messenger & Comments, Instagram DMs & Comments, Live WebChat)
Universal Conversational Chatbots for Whatsapp, Facebook, Instagram, Live WebChat & CRM automation for Promotions, Engagement, Notification
Deep Workflow Automation for Jewellery Businesses to manage 360 communication internally with Teams and externally with customers
